name: ProductParameter
comment: Represents the valid parameter codes that are associated with each product present in product catalog.Examples of parameter code include:* Product Device: parameter code values,  Brand, Model, and so on.* Product Contract: parameter code values, Contract Duration, Contract Start Date, Contract End Date and so on.
vf short description: Represents the valid parameter codes that are associated with each product present in product catalog.Examples of parameter code include:* Product Device: parameter code values,  Brand, Model, and so on.

fields.name: ProductParameterSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: ProductParameterKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the product parameter in ALDM. Each product parameter key value represents a unique product parameter. Generated Key based on Product Parameter Id and Product Parameter Type Ind

fields.name: ProductParameterName
fields.comment: Indicates the descriptive name of the product parameter. For Product OfferingproductOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.localizedName.value where productOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.localizedName.locale = "en-US" For Product SpecificationproductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.localizedName.value where productSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.localizedName.locale = "en-US"For Product Catalog TypecharacteristicsList.name

fields.name: MandatoryFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the property value is mandatory in the Amdocs Ordering system. This indicator is used as a default, but can be changed for a specific product.Values are:- 1- Mandatory- 0 - Optional

fields.name: ConstantFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether it is possible to modify the property value in the Amdocs Ordering system. If set to TRUE , the property always retains its default value as its actual value.Values are:- 1 - Property value cannot be changed.- 0 - Property value can be changed.

fields.name: DynamicFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the property is dynamic.Values are:- 1 - Dynamic- 0 - Static

fields.name: ProductParameterId
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the product parameter in the catalog of the source system. The Product Parameter Id field is populated only for Component parameters and not for Billing Offer parameters. For Product OfferingproductOffering.productOfferingCharacteristic.nameFor Product SpecificationproductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.nameFor Product Catalog TypecharacteristicsList.id

fields.name: ProductParameterTypeInd
fields.comment: Indicates the property type.Values are:C - Company propertyB - Billing offer propertyFor C1D1, the values are PO for Product Offering PS for Product Specification PCT for Product Catalog Type PO for Product Offering PS for Product Specification PCT for Product Catalog Type

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
